cell.paragraph:
A set of predefined project items have been defined for Eiffel Systems. To add a new item to a project that is currently open, right click on the project icon in the
0 Eiffel Solution Explorer !DefaultAssociativeIndexSolution Explorer and from the context menu, select Add. Once expanded there are a number of items allowing you to add the more common project items. To access all available new item select Add New Item. To add an existing file to the project select Add Existing Item.
You may also use the main Project menu to add new items to the currently active project.

The
0 vxurfAddNewItemDialogBoxAdd New Items Dialog is partitioned into associative groups.

list.item: UI: User interface items, encompasing Winforms, Winform Controls and EiffelVision2 Windows and Dialogs.
Code: Various code only orientation Eiffel classes.
Data: Data files that can be incorperated with your project.

cell.paragraph: Select the type of item that you wish to add to your project and the location to create the new item in, and click Open. The new item will then be added to your project and opened in its default view.
For more information on each type item follow the link to the item of intrest.
